showList :: [Stack a] -> ShowS #

Stack data structure.

empty :: Stack a #

Creates empty Stack.

isEmpty :: Stack a -> Bool #

Checks whether Stack is empty.

push :: a -> Stack a -> Stack a #

push x s – put a value x on a top of a Stack s.

top :: Stack a -> a #

top s – returns a value from a top of a Stack s.

pop :: Stack a -> (a, Stack a) #

pop s – returns a tuple consisting of a value from a top of a Stack s and the remaining part of a Stack s.
